title: SpecificDropShipLocation
description: This schema is used to set up a shipping location for a drop shipper where you know the specific inventory that drop shipper will ship for you and the location the given inventory ships from

dropship_location_name.description:
Name used to identify the given shipping location

			#Valid Value

			1-30 character limit

ds_address_line_1.description: Line 1 of the drop ship location address

ds_address_line_2.description: Line 2 of the drop ship location address

ds_address_city.description: drop ship location address address city

ds_address_state.description: drop ship location address address state

ds_address_zip.description: drop ship location address address zip code

merchant_operating_days.description:
Days of the week that you will process and submit orders to the Drop Shipper

			Enter all that apply in pipe delimited format. Ex: Mon | Tues| Wed | Thu  	

			#Valid Values

			*'sun' - Sunday

			*'mon' - Monday

			*'tue' - Tuesday

			*'wed' - Wednesday

			*'thu' - Thursday

			*'fri' - Friday

			*'sat' - Saturday

ds_operating_days.description:
Days of the week that the given drop ship location is open for operations.  Enter all that apply in pipe delimited format. Ex: Mon | Tues| Wed | Thu

			#Logic

			This is required if 'location_type' = 'dropship'

			#Valid Values

			*'sun' - Sunday

			*'mon' - Monday

			*'tue' - Tuesday

			*'wed' - Wednesday

			*'thu' - Thursday

			*'fri' - Friday

			*'sat' - Saturday

time_to_process.description:
Number of business days from receipt of an order  until it will be transmitted to FBA or Drop Ship location

			#Valid Values

			*'0' - ships the day the order is received

			*'1' - ships one business day after the order is received

			*'2' - ships two business days after the order is received

			*'n' - ships n business days after the order is received

order_cutoff_time.description: Time of day that a shipment must be received by in order to count as being received that calendar day for purposes of calculating 'time_to_process' for merchant_orders for this dropship_location_name

fulfillment_time.description:
Number of business days from when you send order to the drop shipper until it will be shipped

			#Valid Values

			*'0' - ships the day the order is received

			*'1' - ships one business day after the order is received

			*'2' - ships two business days after the order is received
			
			*'n' - ships n business days after the order is received

service_level.description:
Provide the list of ServiceLevels that are supported for delivery from this location

			#Valid Values

			*'Standard'

			*'Expedited'

			*'Scheduled'

			*'NextDay'

			*'SecondDay'
